name: Dawei Cheng
content: Dawei Cheng Dawei Cheng Associate Professor Tongji University Email: dcheng AT tongji.edu.cn Biography Dawei Cheng (ç¨å¤§ä¼) is currently an associate professor appointed at the School of Computer Science and Technology of Tongji University (åæµå¤§å­¦), Shanghai, China. I serve as dean assistant of Collaborative Innovation Center of Internet Finance Safety, and guest Ph.D. supervisor at the University of Technology Sydney, Australia. I specialize in data mining, machine learning, deep learning and reinforcement learning. Now I mainly focus on graph learning, big data in finance, deep learning in complex graphs, generative artificial intelligence and large-scale graph analysis. Prior to now, I was a postdoctoral associate at Center for Brain-like Computing and Machine Intelligence (BCMI), Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU) , China. Before that, I obtained my Ph.D degree in computer science from Shanghai Jiao Tong University, supervised by Prof. Liqing Zhang and bachelor degree from Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics. Interests Big Data in Finance Graph Learning, Data Mining Deep Learning and AIGC Deep Reinforcement Learning Academic Services AC/SPC/PC of ICML, ICLR, NeurIPS, KDD, ACL, ICDE, AAAI, IJCAI, etc. AE/Reviewer of TKDE, TPAMI, TNNLS, TKDD, PR, FCS, etc. Distinguished Member of CCF Shanghai News Elected as World's Top 2% Scientists by Standford University and Elsevier. Updated on Sep 28, 2025 My responsible National Science Foundation of China was approved. Graph Data Learning (NSFC Young Scientists Fund, Class B). Updated on Aug 30, 2025. 3 Years. Elected as the Best Reviewer for KDD 2025. Updated on Jun 28, 2025 Deliver a Tutorial about AIGC for Graphs on ICDE 2025. Updated on May 22, 2025 Two papers about LLMs for Multi-Agent Systems were accepted by ACL. Updated on May 16, 2025 Two papers were accepted by IJCAI and two by ICML 2025, respectively.
